TextView.android:text:
After you have labeled requisite amount of notifications in the DIARY view, you can then ENABLE PREDICTIONS.
 
 The predictions mode will use your interactions (CLICK or DISMISS) and the importance/timing information on each notification, and use machine learning to predict if a notification should be shown or hidden.
 
 After you enable predictions, a machine learning model is generated and you will see information (estimated accuracy etc.) about the model.
 
 Enabling predictions will mute your ring tone and vibration, and Notification Diary will store your ringtone settings. Notification Diary will send a cue (sound or vibration) when you receive calls or new notifications.
 
 You can disable the sound control in the SETTINGS view if you wish.
 
 Click next to continue the tutorial or previous to return to previous page.
